column4: guys, please help me. there is other way to install ubuntu? I`ve selected Install Ubuntu, Test CD, Test memory, live but everything I choose it`s just hanging on doing nothing. I haven`t got any spash screen, or progress bar.... ony the dvd reader led is showing activity, that`s all. thank you so much!!!!!!!!!
what is an alternate cd? thank you!
follow the links someone else linked, should be in there
